tokens.name: BlackPengu / SOL
tokens.ai_reasoning:
**Rationale:**  
- **BUY Signal:** Buy/Sell Ratio (2.0) > 1.5 indicates strong buying pressure. Stable momentum suggests standard parameters but with aggressive entry due to high buying pressure.  
- **Limit Order:** Strong buying pressure (ratio 2.0) overrides high volatility (80.8% price change), so enter at market (0%).  
- **Take Profit:** Volume ($11,104) > $10k → +35% (mid-range of +20%–+40%).  
- **Stop Loss:** High volatility (80.8% price change) → -20% (mid-range of -15%–-25%).  
- **Time Frame:** High volatility → 1h (within 30min–2h).
